reviewText: This lots and lots of Monster trucks is on at my house just about every weekend my 3 year old son just loves it.
Purchased for 3 yr old grandson...he would watch this DVD non-stop if allowed...he loves it!  Has good variety of trucks and other vehicles to entertain for hours!

My wife and I have two boys one of which is 2 years old and is pretty much obsessed with cars and trucks, and dinosaurs and is really a boy's boy. He also loves Monster Trucks. We've got some from our library but spent most of the time wincing at the idiots they had hosting the show. Why people feel kids need people with the IQ's of an over-cooked cabbage hosting show's I will never know. Anyway lots of pointless "action" and even my son was bored of them. Finally I said that all they really need is a tape only showing monster trucks for an hour and nothing else no stupid skits or pointless voice overs that kids don't care about anyway. This DVD fits the bill perfectly, it's never dull and just keeps the action coming. It's perfect for little kids who just want to watch the trucks do their thing. If you have kids you could't ask for more.
Tons of monster trucks.  Not much else to it, but that's all that matters for my kid.  He likes having this on in the background while he is playing with HIS monster trucks.

I bought this dvd for my Grandson,he is 4 and just loves this video!!
 We watch it all the time at home and in our van.
It just took a couple of days to get here and was worth the money.
I would recommened this video for anyone with little boys that love monster trucks.

Bought this for my monster truck-obsessed 3 year old. He absolutely ADORES the video. Plays it pretty much every day. I personally think the quality is kind of poor, but it has lots of footage and changes from one thing to the next so young ones don't loose interest. I would definitely recommend purchasing this for any kid who thinks monster trucks are the end-all and be-all.

My 2 year old son loves monster trucks, but we have never taken him to actually see them because they are so loud.  We bought this video in hopes that it would be the next best thing to seeing them live...it is!  He loves watching the trucks drive over cars, roll over and crash.  My husband and I even enjoy watching.  This video is worth every penny!
MY GARNDSON LIKES MONSTER TRUCKS GREAT FOR YOUNG CHILDREN NO BAD WORDS OR STUFF YOU MIGHT NOT WANT YOUNG CHILDREN SEEING.
My nephew is a car/truck fanatic all of toys are cars & trucks.  He loves this!
Grandson who is 5yrs enjoyed it.
Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks DVD Vol. 1
DO NOT RENT THIS VIDEO.  IT PLAYS A TRAIN VIDEO, NOT LOTS&LOTS of MONSTER TRUCKS
0- Awful!  This links to the wrong video- it's all trains!  My toddler was less than happy and so am I after paying for this.
are you kidding me..I want my money back!  not one monster truck and one upset little boy
Sadly we rented Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks but did not receive it! We received Lots and Lots of Big Trains. Very disappointed children right now!
I spent money for a monster truck movie for my son to watch, not trains!  I want my money back please.
This is not a monster truck video. It is only about trains. It has the wrong title and description.
This is NOT Lots & Lots of Monster Trucks. This is about trains. I would like a refund!

After twenty minutes I have yet to see a single monster truck and my toddler is pissed. If I could rate this with -5 stars I would. I'll remember to watch this if I ever want to see twenty minutes of trains and then enjoy a proper melt down from my kid. Should come with a bottle of wine and a cookie. Then it would deserve one star.
gave to grandson , almost 3  years- has been entertained  with this immensely! He wants to see "muddy trucks" over and over!
Would not play in Xbox 360.
bought for my 2 year old grandson, he loves monster trucks on youtube, but this does not hold his interest long
A++ fast shipment
video was good, music was ok. but I had bought it thinking there was going to be sounds from the trucks. my grandson walked away from the tv, he loves monster trucks but without sound no interest.
Not as expected but my grandson liked it
A +
my 3 year old grandson loved this dvd.. i am going to buy more of them
My 2 y/o grandson has to watch it every time he comes over. Not too sure about the "porno" music dubbed over the truck noise
Very disappointed in this video. I could have gotten more watching youtube.
My grandson loves this
Arrived on time and as expected. Thank you
My 4 year old son is obsessed with monster trucks and absolutely loves these movies. I personally think they're a little corny. Would purchase again. Arrived on time or before due.
fun
To much music no truck sounds
good movie. my 2 year old grandson loves it.
My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves this movie and watches it over and over. He sings along to the song and bops his head to the music. He knows the monster trucks by name.
80's metal soundtrack, vhs quality. But my kids love it.
My great nephew loves it!!!

It has great action scenes but it does not keep our sons attention and he is obsessed with monster trucks.  We have other dvds he likes a lot more. Our son is 3 in case anyone needs an idea of his age.
Same as other movie, it was bad quality, and I will not buy them again, and I would not refer them to anyone.
It did not hold the interest of my grandson.  He lost interest in it about one third of the way into the video.

This has to be one of the big disappointment - watched it expecting to see a monster truck show kind of - all it is is clips with crappy music which hides the sound of the trucks - I and my son both disappointed - not worth the $$

Poor quality video - Poor quality everything - It is cell phone quality movies of trucks - No editing ,,, kind of stand and shoot. put it in the box and sell it - The best thing I can say is I returned it without any hassles
My three year old insists on watching this constantly but is bored with it shortly after it starts. Doesn't keep his attention for very long.
Low budget. We only have one tv so I like it when our family can enjoy a DVD. The only kid enjoying this is my son. I've hidden it it's so poorly done.

I purchased this for my grandson who just turned 5.  It's a great DVD, he was glued to watching it.  It's great that it doesn't have a lot of talking in it.  I only give 4 Stars because I thought some of the images showed way to many pixels (maybe that's what they wanted). Great buy for the money.

My son LOVED Lots of Trucks and Trains, and Lots of Monster Trucks was just as great. We do not watch monster truck shows regularly, which I see some reviews are disappointed because they wanted to see their favorite trucks. This is just a video of random trucks doing random things. Not actual racing. Which is exactly what we wanted.

Our son (age 2) LOVVVVES the original Lots & Lots of Trucks DVD - good production value, good songs, good pace, good length. In comparison, this video sucks. It's so much longer, but not because there is more content. It's just longer. The production value is total crap - long segments of monster trucks racing, then the same kind of race again, then again. Every once and a while there is a psychedelic kaleidoscope effect on the video, very strange if you ask me. The songs/music are no where near the quality of the original. Overall the editing is poorly done, they clearly put this together in a hurry. I was so hopeful because our son is a HUGE monster truck fan, but even this couldn't hold his attention. He likes holding the DVD box to look at the pictures but doesn't actually want to watch the video anymore.

I bought this for our 2 year old grandson.  He loves trucks, and will sit and watch this DVD over and over.  It is non-stop action and he loves the sound track.  Older kids maybe not so much, as it does not have the engine sounds on the sound track.  Older children would probably prefer to hear the engines reving rather than the childrens songs.
bought this for my son. He loves watching this. Watches it over and over. fast shipper. Would recommend to everyone. thank you
I purchased several monster truck items for Christmas.  My grandson loves them and he enjoys watching this DVD.  I recommend!

I bought this DVD for my two-year-old son who loves, loves, loves monster trucks.  This video is great because it goes straight to the action--no talking or commentary.  It's comprised of a lot of short clips of monster trucks jumping or doing tricks or whatever it is that monster trucks do.  There's plenty of action, which keeps his attention while I cook dinner or unpack groceries.  I don't know if an adult would enjoy the DVD (it appears to be mostly older clips and has an annoying soundtrack), but it's perfect for little boys that love trucks.

For the money, this is a great video.  Like others have said, there's no stupid 'voice overs' or announcers. It's just straight monster trucks! The music is attention grabbing for my 3 year old and 6 year old... if you have a kid that loves monster trucks, this is a great choice!
Great little movies my son loves them,he is at that stage where he cant get enough monster trucks  he watches these on a loop
This is a good video especially for the young boys that really like tough trucks! It's old school video but that's ok, my 3yr old likes it!

Our grandson seems to like any mechanical device that moves.  It all started with Thomas trains, but it has since moved to more worldly things like monster trucks.  Needless to sat, he devoured this DVD.
This is a great monster tuck video for little kids. Lots of action even if it is old footage and music!

We had this playing in the background of my sons 6th bday party.  The boys liked it.  I rated that it was ok because the quality is pretty poor and the sound of it gets pretty annoying and can handle in small doses.

Okay, my son likes it granted. However, the footage is very grainy, the added special effects came from another era. The music came straight out of the 80's and repeats over and over. Wish it wasn't so dated and a little more appealing to the ear. If I am going to let my son watch  something over and over, it could surely be somewhat bearable to listen to.
Bought this for my four year old grandson and he watches it every day.  He loves monster trucks and this hits the spot.
3 year old grandson loved it!!  Great buy for the money. would reccomend to those who are looking for monster trucks movies. action packed
I bought this DVD for my grandson. He is really into monster trucks. He loves it. It is on the TV all day.

My grandchildren were expecting the newer Monster Trucks.  They did not like
the narration on this or the trucks.  They only watched it once.

This video is pretty good.  The music is decent and fun. And the clips are pretty good. There are a few segments in the video hat my son lost interest but overall it's a good video that shows racing and car crushing
Bought for sons. They love the DVD. Has a lot of action. Exactly what they expected. Great excitement. If you like monster trucks, a must have.

This DVD is not what I was hoping for.  My son is interested in monster trucks and really wants to just have shows where he can watch the monster trucks do their tricks all the way through the DVD.  He watched this disk, but wasn't what we were really looking for.
It does have lots of monster trucks. They are mostly old school. Sound track is all music should have live track to make it more interesting
My boys are heavy into monste trucks. This DVD was very Loud. the music was a bit much and overshadowed the trucks themselves.
So excited to see all the trucks in this child friendly way.  My son is too small to take to a live show so this will tide him over in his love for all things Monster truck until then.

Besides the annoying music this video is strait forwarded and all about monster trucks. My 1 & 4 year old love watching this over and over but the only sad part of the movie is it does not have a auto repeat like some others do or a quick play. Other then that its a great buy for the price.

When a present makes a young child happy, no other words are necessary.  Delivery very fast and that helped as our celebration was 12/22/2012.  Did fall asleep after watching twice and viewed several times the next day over and over.
Kids who love monster trucks will love this DVD. It is packed full of fun, thrills and information. My 5 year old grandson loves to watch it surrounded by all his monster trucks.

I bought this DVD for our 2 year old son who was starting to be interested in monster trucks - he asks for it every day and sits trance-like watching it gripping his two miniature trucks... The bad 80's graphics, music, mullets and oversized trucks just make the dvd more fun for the adults in the room to watch and remember the neon and styles of the 80's.  A really great DVD!

My Grandson looks at monster trucks videos on utube but they are short and we are constantly looking for the next one.  This DVD is great.  It has lots of action and great music that keeps his attention.

I was looking for something my two year old could watch and keep his interest.  He loves monster trucks but the monster jams on tv involve a lot of waiting.  This dvd only shows the good parts about monster trucks - jumping, flipping, going through mud and overall action.  It is all set to music.  He loves watching it and has watched over and over in the three months we have owned it so far.

I purchased this product after reading so many reviews stating how this is an all truck movie about trucks in various performances where kids are just drawn to it.  Unfortunately after receiving this movie for my 3 year old, both he and I were very disappointed.  While I agree it is much more affordable then the Monster Jam films you can buy for double or triple the cost, there is a reason why they cost more.
This movie comes up with a menu similair to movies you see that are pirated with a computerized cheapy menu of scenes for the Main Menu.  After you select to play all you first notice the out of focus recording of many trucks driving around to music louder then the truck reving noises.  Unfortunately this was a downer for my 3 year old.  He is huge into trucks and has a couple of the Grave Digger Monster Jam movies and while they were more costly, they also keep his attention much more and he watches them more often.  While he was mildy entertained by seeing the "big trucks!" the first time watching this movie, he has not wanted to watch it again and I ended up buying more movies from Monster Jam because he likes the details of the in focus recording and the sounds of the crashes and the trucks more then the overwhelming music in this video.
That being said, I gave this movie 3 stars because it is what it says...it is a movie of lots and lots of trucks, it's just too bad they didn't do a better job putting in cleaner film with better resolution and a little quieter music so the kids can hear the trucks more.

We got this to replace a more annoying option, and it has been a huge hit! My 3- year-old watches it as often as we let him.  We also got another "lots and lots" movie, and after awhile my son's favorite part was the preview for this one! This is not educational viewing, but it's a good hour of entertainment and a chance to get some chores done around the house.  Even the baby (9 months) will watch it for a few minutes here and there.
Finally got the dvd.  It freezes but the kids love it and all the other monster truck movies. I would never take them to a real monster truck show, but the movies will do.

I purchased this for my 4 1/2 year old Grandson as a gift.
He loved watching it and does watch it quite a bit.
KZ

Really enjoyed watching this video. A lot of extra video clips of dragsters, mud boggers, cars that flip over, demo derbies, etc. Really worth the money! And there is no talking throughout the video like there is in some of the other dvds I bought. You hear music and sometimes the roaring of the engines, which I would have liked to hear more of.
This was purchased as a present for a grandson who loves Big Foot and other trucks. He wanted to watch it with me and it was enjoyable.

I purchased this for my 3yr old, who happens to be crazy about monster trucks. This video was obviously made many, many years ago. It has old school monster trucks and cheesy, corny music. I absolutely LOATHE listening to this DVD play, but my child could care less...he still enjoys the action.

My son is 4 yrs old and Monster Truck Crazy. He LOVES this DVD and watches it over and over again. If you have a child that loves Monster trucks, he will love this movie. No voices... just Monster trucks and music.

To be honest I doubt my grandson really notices or cares.  For me, even though I saw previous reviewers comment negatively on the quality, I was still disappointed.  To be fair, my grandson does stay glued to it when it is on.  It is however easily forgettable.
Lots of live video to music only. My 3 year old thinks it's great. Jumps,rolls,crashes this video has it all. Very entertaining.

We have purchased several really bad DVD's that supposedly featured trucks, trains, etc.  This DVD truly delivers.  It is ALL Monster Trucks & related fun stuff for kids.  Lots of Bigfoot & other well known trucks.  Lots of action including demolition derby, rolling ramp cars, etc.  No announcers talking, just fun music.  If you are looking for just trucks & car video for kids to watch, this is it.  No other nonsense.

We DVR Monster Jam for our 2.5 year old son. I got this for when we were away from home thinking it would be similar. It has fairly lame music and even seriously some karaoke sounding stuff. We turned it off. It did hold his attention but wasn't what we were thinking at all. Also most of the monster trucks weren't the newer ones he knows the names of. Seemed old.
Purchased this for my 3 year old grandson. My daughter said he watched a show about Monster Trucks on The History Channel and was so excited about them. Now he can watch them whenever he wants!

Alright, so I ordered this dvd for my 2 and half yr old, expecting it would be just as awesome as most all of the reviews said it was. BUT, I cant hardly even watch it without having it almost MUTE! If you don't mind heavy metal music then nevermind this comment, however, it was just waaaay to much for me. Yes, there is a lot of action...but the graphics on some of the taping of it hurt my eyes (i don't even know how to describe this part) it was electric colors flashing throughout the "way to close shots" of the monster truck action. But anyway, my biggest complaint is the CRAZY heavy metal instruments playing throughout most of the movie! I have enough noise going on in my household with 2 kids that I don't need crazy music screeching in my ears as well. I wish I wouldve spent the extra money on the other actual Monster Jam dvds :(
This dvd has crappy special effects. Also, the variety of monster trucks is very limited. If your child likes the Hot Wheels monster trucks...they will be disappointed.

If you want to see a lot of the famous trucks from decades gones by this is a good show. The quality of the video is suprisingly good! The show is busy and jump from scene to scene but is a lot of fun for Monster Truck fans of all ages.

I read the reviews and thought this would be a great video for my kids ages 3 and 5. Boy was I wrong. The background music drowns out the best part-the roar of the engine. You have to strain yourself to hear it. Also, everything is in fast foward or slow motion, which kind of takes the wow factor out of the action. It's more like a music video. My kids did not even pay any attention to it.
My son who is three years old, really enjoys this video. There isn't any narrating of the video just music and monster trucks. If your son likes monster trucks, it is well worth the price

My grandson, age 9, is getting to be quite an expert on monster trucks.  He loves his collection and this DVD will soon be worn out from use.  He can watch this action DVD over and over for hours.  Something he can enjoy and share with his Dad.  Must say, Amazon has just about any item you desire on a special theme.

thank you for the dvd it came on time sorry things were stressed and didn't write a review but great shippiong and product in great new condition . thanks again
danielle

The name says it all. This is a dvd of a whole heck of a lot of monster trucks. No talking heads, no nothing to distract from the point. To a toddler, this is nirvana. Since we got this for our two year old son, I'm rating this a complete success. Just be aware that, to adult eyes, this dvd is going to be of questionable visual quality, and REALLY monotonous. The good news is it's not unbearably long. If you have a young one that adores all things vehicular, they will love this video. We have another set that had WAY too many talking heads. Toddlers don't care what the talking heads have to say, they want to watch TRUCKS. With this dvd, they get to.
This is a fantastic movie if your child loves monster trucks.  The music drives me crazy but my son doesn't complain if I turn down the volume.  Definitely getting our money's worth out of this DVD.
My 2 year old grandson is absolutely in love with monster trucks.  He will watch this video over and over and over.  Great item, quick turnaround.  Definitely pleased.
Great inexpensive video. My son loved it. It does not have any trucks from Monster Jam, but he got into them later so it didn't matter.

This is a great video describing the contents of one of the award-winning children's series Lots and Lots of ... DVDs. Just Search for LOTS AND LOTS OF and you'll see the entire DVD series including: LOTS AND LOTS AND LOTS OF FIRE TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Fire Trucks DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF MONSTER TRUCKS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks DVD Vol. 1 MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD SET MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD Set LOTS AND LOTS OF TRAINS VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of Trains DVD Vol 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF TOY TRAINS AND MODEL RAILORADS VOL. 1 Lots and Lots of Toy Trains and Model Railroads Volume 1 DVD Movie LOTS AND LOTS OF JETS AND PLANES VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of JETS and PLANES DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF CARS, MONSTER TRUCKS AND HIGH SPEED RACERS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Fast Cars, Monster Trucks and High Speed Racers Vol 1 DVD - Extreme Motorsports LOTS AND LOTS OF TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Trucks Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF PLAYFUL PENGUINS Lots and Lots of Playful Penguins & Their Toe-Tappin Feet -All About Penguins DVD LOTS AND LOTS OF PENGUINS IN THE WILD Lots and Lots of Penguins In The Wild DVD These are all award-winning DVDs that make great gifts for kids of all ages and are not available in stores so order here! Kids with autism love them too because they contain lots of action shots and fun, sing-a-long music from award-winning children's musician James Coffey. ALSO SEARCH FOR OTHER DVDS, BOOKS AND CDS FROM MARSHALL PUBLISHING INCLUDING: TV's Greatest Game Shows Book and DVD; TV's Greatest Comedians; Lots and Lots of Fire Safety Tips and Songs; ALL ABOARD The Legends of the Rails - The exciting history of passenger trains in America!; The Complete History of America's Railroads.

I thought the DVD was annoying especially the music.  I was hoping for just the monster trucks doing their thing but there is all this editing and I just could not follow it very well.  My 3 year old kind of lost interest in it and he LOVES monster trucks.  Would not recommend.

My 3 year old likes all the newer monster trucks like Blue Thunder and Monster Mutt but this DVD is really old footage and doesn't have the more modern trucks in it with the exception of Grave Digger and not much of that. The music is annoying and I can't sit and watch with him like I do with his other monster truck DVDs.
You can get a better DVD then this for free when you buy a 3 pack of "monster truck fan favorites". Other then that I recommend spending a little more money on a Monster Jam DVD. There is a lot more and better footage then on this one and it is entertaining for adults as well as kids.

I bought this dvd because it had a lower price than the ones at the actual monster truck shoe we went to.  I was surprised by the length of the show.  It is pretty long and great for long car trips.  I guess I was looking for a vide with more cohesive racing/show.  This video is short clips of various races in both the U.S. and other countries.  It breaks out the clips by different things the trucks do.  Like crashing, mud racing, water racing and more crashing.  It is great for kids I guess, but I could do with out the disjointed segments.  Also most of it was shot before the digital age so the video is very graining and 80's looking.  I'm now looking for a more modern version of this video with clearer images and less cheesy special effects.

My 7 year old son really liked the videos, mostly cut together well to keep your attention.  However, my main issue is with the quality of the disc.  The disc itself is not a stamped DVD its a purple bottom DVDr someone would burn at home!  No where does it it say that in description...

I don't want to be mean, but I'll be honest. This video is target for kids, but I think this DVD doesn't educate kids about monster trucks. There are some nice classic trucks, but this video doesn't do justice for any truck and I was hoping the annoying music would go away, but never did. I give 2 stars for monster trucks, but kids and adults will not like this DVD.

Most young boys have a fascination with trucks and my grandson is no exception. My son took him to an arena to see the monster trucks in person but they were so loud they left after 15 minutes. Knowing how much my grandson enjoyed them - I bought this CD.  He has watched it many times and never seems to tire of it. I am now his favorite relative.
AFTER MY GRANDSON WATCHED THIS DVD HE HAD TO HAVE THE MONSTER TRUCKS HOT WHEELS TRUCKS & NOW THAT IS WHAT HE PLAYS WITH DAILY.  I WILL BE BUYING VOLUME 2 FOR HIS BIRTHDAY..
This lots and lots of Monster trucks is on at my house just about every weekend my 3 year old son just loves it.
Purchased for 3 yr old grandson...he would watch this DVD non-stop if allowed...he loves it!  Has good variety of trucks and other vehicles to entertain for hours!

My wife and I have two boys one of which is 2 years old and is pretty much obsessed with cars and trucks, and dinosaurs and is really a boy's boy. He also loves Monster Trucks. We've got some from our library but spent most of the time wincing at the idiots they had hosting the show. Why people feel kids need people with the IQ's of an over-cooked cabbage hosting show's I will never know. Anyway lots of pointless "action" and even my son was bored of them. Finally I said that all they really need is a tape only showing monster trucks for an hour and nothing else no stupid skits or pointless voice overs that kids don't care about anyway. This DVD fits the bill perfectly, it's never dull and just keeps the action coming. It's perfect for little kids who just want to watch the trucks do their thing. If you have kids you could't ask for more.
Tons of monster trucks.  Not much else to it, but that's all that matters for my kid.  He likes having this on in the background while he is playing with HIS monster trucks.

I bought this dvd for my Grandson,he is 4 and just loves this video!!
 We watch it all the time at home and in our van.
It just took a couple of days to get here and was worth the money.
I would recommened this video for anyone with little boys that love monster trucks.

Bought this for my monster truck-obsessed 3 year old. He absolutely ADORES the video. Plays it pretty much every day. I personally think the quality is kind of poor, but it has lots of footage and changes from one thing to the next so young ones don't loose interest. I would definitely recommend purchasing this for any kid who thinks monster trucks are the end-all and be-all.

My 2 year old son loves monster trucks, but we have never taken him to actually see them because they are so loud.  We bought this video in hopes that it would be the next best thing to seeing them live...it is!  He loves watching the trucks drive over cars, roll over and crash.  My husband and I even enjoy watching.  This video is worth every penny!
MY GARNDSON LIKES MONSTER TRUCKS GREAT FOR YOUNG CHILDREN NO BAD WORDS OR STUFF YOU MIGHT NOT WANT YOUNG CHILDREN SEEING.
My nephew is a car/truck fanatic all of toys are cars & trucks.  He loves this!
Grandson who is 5yrs enjoyed it.
Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks DVD Vol. 1
DO NOT RENT THIS VIDEO.  IT PLAYS A TRAIN VIDEO, NOT LOTS&LOTS of MONSTER TRUCKS
0- Awful!  This links to the wrong video- it's all trains!  My toddler was less than happy and so am I after paying for this.
are you kidding me..I want my money back!  not one monster truck and one upset little boy
Sadly we rented Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks but did not receive it! We received Lots and Lots of Big Trains. Very disappointed children right now!
I spent money for a monster truck movie for my son to watch, not trains!  I want my money back please.
This is not a monster truck video. It is only about trains. It has the wrong title and description.
This is NOT Lots & Lots of Monster Trucks. This is about trains. I would like a refund!

After twenty minutes I have yet to see a single monster truck and my toddler is pissed. If I could rate this with -5 stars I would. I'll remember to watch this if I ever want to see twenty minutes of trains and then enjoy a proper melt down from my kid. Should come with a bottle of wine and a cookie. Then it would deserve one star.
gave to grandson , almost 3  years- has been entertained  with this immensely! He wants to see "muddy trucks" over and over!
Would not play in Xbox 360.
bought for my 2 year old grandson, he loves monster trucks on youtube, but this does not hold his interest long
A++ fast shipment
video was good, music was ok. but I had bought it thinking there was going to be sounds from the trucks. my grandson walked away from the tv, he loves monster trucks but without sound no interest.
Not as expected but my grandson liked it
A +
my 3 year old grandson loved this dvd.. i am going to buy more of them
My 2 y/o grandson has to watch it every time he comes over. Not too sure about the "porno" music dubbed over the truck noise
Very disappointed in this video. I could have gotten more watching youtube.
My grandson loves this
Arrived on time and as expected. Thank you
My 4 year old son is obsessed with monster trucks and absolutely loves these movies. I personally think they're a little corny. Would purchase again. Arrived on time or before due.
fun
To much music no truck sounds
good movie. my 2 year old grandson loves it.
My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves this movie and watches it over and over. He sings along to the song and bops his head to the music. He knows the monster trucks by name.
80's metal soundtrack, vhs quality. But my kids love it.
My great nephew loves it!!!

It has great action scenes but it does not keep our sons attention and he is obsessed with monster trucks.  We have other dvds he likes a lot more. Our son is 3 in case anyone needs an idea of his age.
Same as other movie, it was bad quality, and I will not buy them again, and I would not refer them to anyone.
It did not hold the interest of my grandson.  He lost interest in it about one third of the way into the video.

This has to be one of the big disappointment - watched it expecting to see a monster truck show kind of - all it is is clips with crappy music which hides the sound of the trucks - I and my son both disappointed - not worth the $$

Poor quality video - Poor quality everything - It is cell phone quality movies of trucks - No editing ,,, kind of stand and shoot. put it in the box and sell it - The best thing I can say is I returned it without any hassles
My three year old insists on watching this constantly but is bored with it shortly after it starts. Doesn't keep his attention for very long.
Low budget. We only have one tv so I like it when our family can enjoy a DVD. The only kid enjoying this is my son. I've hidden it it's so poorly done.

I purchased this for my grandson who just turned 5.  It's a great DVD, he was glued to watching it.  It's great that it doesn't have a lot of talking in it.  I only give 4 Stars because I thought some of the images showed way to many pixels (maybe that's what they wanted). Great buy for the money.

My son LOVED Lots of Trucks and Trains, and Lots of Monster Trucks was just as great. We do not watch monster truck shows regularly, which I see some reviews are disappointed because they wanted to see their favorite trucks. This is just a video of random trucks doing random things. Not actual racing. Which is exactly what we wanted.

Our son (age 2) LOVVVVES the original Lots & Lots of Trucks DVD - good production value, good songs, good pace, good length. In comparison, this video sucks. It's so much longer, but not because there is more content. It's just longer. The production value is total crap - long segments of monster trucks racing, then the same kind of race again, then again. Every once and a while there is a psychedelic kaleidoscope effect on the video, very strange if you ask me. The songs/music are no where near the quality of the original. Overall the editing is poorly done, they clearly put this together in a hurry. I was so hopeful because our son is a HUGE monster truck fan, but even this couldn't hold his attention. He likes holding the DVD box to look at the pictures but doesn't actually want to watch the video anymore.

I bought this for our 2 year old grandson.  He loves trucks, and will sit and watch this DVD over and over.  It is non-stop action and he loves the sound track.  Older kids maybe not so much, as it does not have the engine sounds on the sound track.  Older children would probably prefer to hear the engines reving rather than the childrens songs.
bought this for my son. He loves watching this. Watches it over and over. fast shipper. Would recommend to everyone. thank you
I purchased several monster truck items for Christmas.  My grandson loves them and he enjoys watching this DVD.  I recommend!

I bought this DVD for my two-year-old son who loves, loves, loves monster trucks.  This video is great because it goes straight to the action--no talking or commentary.  It's comprised of a lot of short clips of monster trucks jumping or doing tricks or whatever it is that monster trucks do.  There's plenty of action, which keeps his attention while I cook dinner or unpack groceries.  I don't know if an adult would enjoy the DVD (it appears to be mostly older clips and has an annoying soundtrack), but it's perfect for little boys that love trucks.

For the money, this is a great video.  Like others have said, there's no stupid 'voice overs' or announcers. It's just straight monster trucks! The music is attention grabbing for my 3 year old and 6 year old... if you have a kid that loves monster trucks, this is a great choice!
Great little movies my son loves them,he is at that stage where he cant get enough monster trucks  he watches these on a loop
This is a good video especially for the young boys that really like tough trucks! It's old school video but that's ok, my 3yr old likes it!

Our grandson seems to like any mechanical device that moves.  It all started with Thomas trains, but it has since moved to more worldly things like monster trucks.  Needless to sat, he devoured this DVD.
This is a great monster tuck video for little kids. Lots of action even if it is old footage and music!

We had this playing in the background of my sons 6th bday party.  The boys liked it.  I rated that it was ok because the quality is pretty poor and the sound of it gets pretty annoying and can handle in small doses.

Okay, my son likes it granted. However, the footage is very grainy, the added special effects came from another era. The music came straight out of the 80's and repeats over and over. Wish it wasn't so dated and a little more appealing to the ear. If I am going to let my son watch  something over and over, it could surely be somewhat bearable to listen to.
Bought this for my four year old grandson and he watches it every day.  He loves monster trucks and this hits the spot.
3 year old grandson loved it!!  Great buy for the money. would reccomend to those who are looking for monster trucks movies. action packed
I bought this DVD for my grandson. He is really into monster trucks. He loves it. It is on the TV all day.

My grandchildren were expecting the newer Monster Trucks.  They did not like
the narration on this or the trucks.  They only watched it once.

This video is pretty good.  The music is decent and fun. And the clips are pretty good. There are a few segments in the video hat my son lost interest but overall it's a good video that shows racing and car crushing
Bought for sons. They love the DVD. Has a lot of action. Exactly what they expected. Great excitement. If you like monster trucks, a must have.

This DVD is not what I was hoping for.  My son is interested in monster trucks and really wants to just have shows where he can watch the monster trucks do their tricks all the way through the DVD.  He watched this disk, but wasn't what we were really looking for.
It does have lots of monster trucks. They are mostly old school. Sound track is all music should have live track to make it more interesting
My boys are heavy into monste trucks. This DVD was very Loud. the music was a bit much and overshadowed the trucks themselves.
So excited to see all the trucks in this child friendly way.  My son is too small to take to a live show so this will tide him over in his love for all things Monster truck until then.

Besides the annoying music this video is strait forwarded and all about monster trucks. My 1 & 4 year old love watching this over and over but the only sad part of the movie is it does not have a auto repeat like some others do or a quick play. Other then that its a great buy for the price.

When a present makes a young child happy, no other words are necessary.  Delivery very fast and that helped as our celebration was 12/22/2012.  Did fall asleep after watching twice and viewed several times the next day over and over.
Kids who love monster trucks will love this DVD. It is packed full of fun, thrills and information. My 5 year old grandson loves to watch it surrounded by all his monster trucks.

I bought this DVD for our 2 year old son who was starting to be interested in monster trucks - he asks for it every day and sits trance-like watching it gripping his two miniature trucks... The bad 80's graphics, music, mullets and oversized trucks just make the dvd more fun for the adults in the room to watch and remember the neon and styles of the 80's.  A really great DVD!

My Grandson looks at monster trucks videos on utube but they are short and we are constantly looking for the next one.  This DVD is great.  It has lots of action and great music that keeps his attention.

I was looking for something my two year old could watch and keep his interest.  He loves monster trucks but the monster jams on tv involve a lot of waiting.  This dvd only shows the good parts about monster trucks - jumping, flipping, going through mud and overall action.  It is all set to music.  He loves watching it and has watched over and over in the three months we have owned it so far.

I purchased this product after reading so many reviews stating how this is an all truck movie about trucks in various performances where kids are just drawn to it.  Unfortunately after receiving this movie for my 3 year old, both he and I were very disappointed.  While I agree it is much more affordable then the Monster Jam films you can buy for double or triple the cost, there is a reason why they cost more.
This movie comes up with a menu similair to movies you see that are pirated with a computerized cheapy menu of scenes for the Main Menu.  After you select to play all you first notice the out of focus recording of many trucks driving around to music louder then the truck reving noises.  Unfortunately this was a downer for my 3 year old.  He is huge into trucks and has a couple of the Grave Digger Monster Jam movies and while they were more costly, they also keep his attention much more and he watches them more often.  While he was mildy entertained by seeing the "big trucks!" the first time watching this movie, he has not wanted to watch it again and I ended up buying more movies from Monster Jam because he likes the details of the in focus recording and the sounds of the crashes and the trucks more then the overwhelming music in this video.
That being said, I gave this movie 3 stars because it is what it says...it is a movie of lots and lots of trucks, it's just too bad they didn't do a better job putting in cleaner film with better resolution and a little quieter music so the kids can hear the trucks more.

We got this to replace a more annoying option, and it has been a huge hit! My 3- year-old watches it as often as we let him.  We also got another "lots and lots" movie, and after awhile my son's favorite part was the preview for this one! This is not educational viewing, but it's a good hour of entertainment and a chance to get some chores done around the house.  Even the baby (9 months) will watch it for a few minutes here and there.
Finally got the dvd.  It freezes but the kids love it and all the other monster truck movies. I would never take them to a real monster truck show, but the movies will do.

I purchased this for my 4 1/2 year old Grandson as a gift.
He loved watching it and does watch it quite a bit.
KZ

Really enjoyed watching this video. A lot of extra video clips of dragsters, mud boggers, cars that flip over, demo derbies, etc. Really worth the money! And there is no talking throughout the video like there is in some of the other dvds I bought. You hear music and sometimes the roaring of the engines, which I would have liked to hear more of.
This was purchased as a present for a grandson who loves Big Foot and other trucks. He wanted to watch it with me and it was enjoyable.

I purchased this for my 3yr old, who happens to be crazy about monster trucks. This video was obviously made many, many years ago. It has old school monster trucks and cheesy, corny music. I absolutely LOATHE listening to this DVD play, but my child could care less...he still enjoys the action.

My son is 4 yrs old and Monster Truck Crazy. He LOVES this DVD and watches it over and over again. If you have a child that loves Monster trucks, he will love this movie. No voices... just Monster trucks and music.

To be honest I doubt my grandson really notices or cares.  For me, even though I saw previous reviewers comment negatively on the quality, I was still disappointed.  To be fair, my grandson does stay glued to it when it is on.  It is however easily forgettable.
Lots of live video to music only. My 3 year old thinks it's great. Jumps,rolls,crashes this video has it all. Very entertaining.

We have purchased several really bad DVD's that supposedly featured trucks, trains, etc.  This DVD truly delivers.  It is ALL Monster Trucks & related fun stuff for kids.  Lots of Bigfoot & other well known trucks.  Lots of action including demolition derby, rolling ramp cars, etc.  No announcers talking, just fun music.  If you are looking for just trucks & car video for kids to watch, this is it.  No other nonsense.

We DVR Monster Jam for our 2.5 year old son. I got this for when we were away from home thinking it would be similar. It has fairly lame music and even seriously some karaoke sounding stuff. We turned it off. It did hold his attention but wasn't what we were thinking at all. Also most of the monster trucks weren't the newer ones he knows the names of. Seemed old.
Purchased this for my 3 year old grandson. My daughter said he watched a show about Monster Trucks on The History Channel and was so excited about them. Now he can watch them whenever he wants!

Alright, so I ordered this dvd for my 2 and half yr old, expecting it would be just as awesome as most all of the reviews said it was. BUT, I cant hardly even watch it without having it almost MUTE! If you don't mind heavy metal music then nevermind this comment, however, it was just waaaay to much for me. Yes, there is a lot of action...but the graphics on some of the taping of it hurt my eyes (i don't even know how to describe this part) it was electric colors flashing throughout the "way to close shots" of the monster truck action. But anyway, my biggest complaint is the CRAZY heavy metal instruments playing throughout most of the movie! I have enough noise going on in my household with 2 kids that I don't need crazy music screeching in my ears as well. I wish I wouldve spent the extra money on the other actual Monster Jam dvds :(
This dvd has crappy special effects. Also, the variety of monster trucks is very limited. If your child likes the Hot Wheels monster trucks...they will be disappointed.

If you want to see a lot of the famous trucks from decades gones by this is a good show. The quality of the video is suprisingly good! The show is busy and jump from scene to scene but is a lot of fun for Monster Truck fans of all ages.

I read the reviews and thought this would be a great video for my kids ages 3 and 5. Boy was I wrong. The background music drowns out the best part-the roar of the engine. You have to strain yourself to hear it. Also, everything is in fast foward or slow motion, which kind of takes the wow factor out of the action. It's more like a music video. My kids did not even pay any attention to it.
My son who is three years old, really enjoys this video. There isn't any narrating of the video just music and monster trucks. If your son likes monster trucks, it is well worth the price

My grandson, age 9, is getting to be quite an expert on monster trucks.  He loves his collection and this DVD will soon be worn out from use.  He can watch this action DVD over and over for hours.  Something he can enjoy and share with his Dad.  Must say, Amazon has just about any item you desire on a special theme.

thank you for the dvd it came on time sorry things were stressed and didn't write a review but great shippiong and product in great new condition . thanks again
danielle

The name says it all. This is a dvd of a whole heck of a lot of monster trucks. No talking heads, no nothing to distract from the point. To a toddler, this is nirvana. Since we got this for our two year old son, I'm rating this a complete success. Just be aware that, to adult eyes, this dvd is going to be of questionable visual quality, and REALLY monotonous. The good news is it's not unbearably long. If you have a young one that adores all things vehicular, they will love this video. We have another set that had WAY too many talking heads. Toddlers don't care what the talking heads have to say, they want to watch TRUCKS. With this dvd, they get to.
This is a fantastic movie if your child loves monster trucks.  The music drives me crazy but my son doesn't complain if I turn down the volume.  Definitely getting our money's worth out of this DVD.
My 2 year old grandson is absolutely in love with monster trucks.  He will watch this video over and over and over.  Great item, quick turnaround.  Definitely pleased.
Great inexpensive video. My son loved it. It does not have any trucks from Monster Jam, but he got into them later so it didn't matter.

This is a great video describing the contents of one of the award-winning children's series Lots and Lots of ... DVDs. Just Search for LOTS AND LOTS OF and you'll see the entire DVD series including: LOTS AND LOTS AND LOTS OF FIRE TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Fire Trucks DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF MONSTER TRUCKS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks DVD Vol. 1 MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD SET MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD Set LOTS AND LOTS OF TRAINS VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of Trains DVD Vol 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF TOY TRAINS AND MODEL RAILORADS VOL. 1 Lots and Lots of Toy Trains and Model Railroads Volume 1 DVD Movie LOTS AND LOTS OF JETS AND PLANES VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of JETS and PLANES DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF CARS, MONSTER TRUCKS AND HIGH SPEED RACERS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Fast Cars, Monster Trucks and High Speed Racers Vol 1 DVD - Extreme Motorsports LOTS AND LOTS OF TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Trucks Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF PLAYFUL PENGUINS Lots and Lots of Playful Penguins & Their Toe-Tappin Feet -All About Penguins DVD LOTS AND LOTS OF PENGUINS IN THE WILD Lots and Lots of Penguins In The Wild DVD These are all award-winning DVDs that make great gifts for kids of all ages and are not available in stores so order here! Kids with autism love them too because they contain lots of action shots and fun, sing-a-long music from award-winning children's musician James Coffey. ALSO SEARCH FOR OTHER DVDS, BOOKS AND CDS FROM MARSHALL PUBLISHING INCLUDING: TV's Greatest Game Shows Book and DVD; TV's Greatest Comedians; Lots and Lots of Fire Safety Tips and Songs; ALL ABOARD The Legends of the Rails - The exciting history of passenger trains in America!; The Complete History of America's Railroads.

I thought the DVD was annoying especially the music.  I was hoping for just the monster trucks doing their thing but there is all this editing and I just could not follow it very well.  My 3 year old kind of lost interest in it and he LOVES monster trucks.  Would not recommend.

My 3 year old likes all the newer monster trucks like Blue Thunder and Monster Mutt but this DVD is really old footage and doesn't have the more modern trucks in it with the exception of Grave Digger and not much of that. The music is annoying and I can't sit and watch with him like I do with his other monster truck DVDs.
You can get a better DVD then this for free when you buy a 3 pack of "monster truck fan favorites". Other then that I recommend spending a little more money on a Monster Jam DVD. There is a lot more and better footage then on this one and it is entertaining for adults as well as kids.

I bought this dvd because it had a lower price than the ones at the actual monster truck shoe we went to.  I was surprised by the length of the show.  It is pretty long and great for long car trips.  I guess I was looking for a vide with more cohesive racing/show.  This video is short clips of various races in both the U.S. and other countries.  It breaks out the clips by different things the trucks do.  Like crashing, mud racing, water racing and more crashing.  It is great for kids I guess, but I could do with out the disjointed segments.  Also most of it was shot before the digital age so the video is very graining and 80's looking.  I'm now looking for a more modern version of this video with clearer images and less cheesy special effects.

My 7 year old son really liked the videos, mostly cut together well to keep your attention.  However, my main issue is with the quality of the disc.  The disc itself is not a stamped DVD its a purple bottom DVDr someone would burn at home!  No where does it it say that in description...

I don't want to be mean, but I'll be honest. This video is target for kids, but I think this DVD doesn't educate kids about monster trucks. There are some nice classic trucks, but this video doesn't do justice for any truck and I was hoping the annoying music would go away, but never did. I give 2 stars for monster trucks, but kids and adults will not like this DVD.

Most young boys have a fascination with trucks and my grandson is no exception. My son took him to an arena to see the monster trucks in person but they were so loud they left after 15 minutes. Knowing how much my grandson enjoyed them - I bought this CD.  He has watched it many times and never seems to tire of it. I am now his favorite relative.
AFTER MY GRANDSON WATCHED THIS DVD HE HAD TO HAVE THE MONSTER TRUCKS HOT WHEELS TRUCKS & NOW THAT IS WHAT HE PLAYS WITH DAILY.  I WILL BE BUYING VOLUME 2 FOR HIS BIRTHDAY..

Our 2 year old son loves this video. It's a little cheesy with 90's footage and production quality. It's kind of cool to see how monster trucks were 20+ years ago when they were based off real trucks, but they're not as exciting as today's trucks. The video also includes some mud racing and junk car rollover competitions. It's all good fun either way.
good video
Grandson loved it
Great product!

Its an alright DVD. I bought it for my two year old whos obessesed with Monster trucks. It has some weird 1990's PowerPoint effects with 1980's rock music. Was kinda disappointed that there was hardly any monster truck sounds as that is whag my child loves.
It's ok basically YouTube videos compilation on a dvd
given as a gift; grandson loved it; quick ship
Ordered wrong one
Grandson likes to watch it
Bought this for my great nephews ages 2 and 3 they loved and so did their dad.  Great for kids who love monster trucks.
